shivaauthentication.name: Shiva API
shivaauthentication.description: Use this plugin to generate a Bearer token for Shiva API authentication. This token is required for authorizing subsequent requests to the Shiva API.

actions.description: Generates a Bearer token for Shiva API authentication. This token is required for authorizing subsequent requests to the Shiva API.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The id of the shiva user

parameters.name: secret
parameters.description: The secret of the shiva user

shivaswaggersearch.description: You have no knowledge of Shiva API! Use this plugin to find the right Shiva enpoints to accomplish your task

actions.description: Fuzzy search through Shiva swagger documentation

parameters.name: auth_token
parameters.description: The Shiva Swagger Search auth token

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of results to return. Ask for a few to get a better overview.
